flow.descriptionCdata:
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.025ab6af-a324-4cf7-98e7-9b8af7106d9b.prompt=Root DN\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.080e1162-fbae-4562-934d-61d30aa16fbd.prompt=Enter password\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.0ee9bfb9-ba6f-428d-ad3f-ee83a237be3c.description=
Authenticates a user against Active Directory.

Inputs\:
host - The hostname or IP address of the AD server.
rootDN - The distinguished name of the root element whose subtree you want to search in (e.g. CN\=Users,DC\=domain,DC\=com).
username - The user's windows username. The only valid format is domain\username.
password - The user's password.

Responses\:
success - User authenticated against AD.
failure - User could not be authenticated.
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.13d10022-4e50-4e75-a999-b3a5d1aad4ed.prompt=Enter new userPassword\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.170e2ba2-01a2-4027-a225-808a2100e6d9.prompt=Enter userPassword\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.17e05933-399b-4906-afdf-5f15488689dc.description=
Creates a new user in Active Directory.

Input Parameters\:
host - domain controller
oUDN - the Organizational Unit DN or Common Name DN to add the user to (i.e. OU\=OUTest1,DC\=battleground,DC\=ad)
userCommonName - the CN, generally the full name of user (i.e. Bob Smith)
userPassword - password for user
sAMAccountName - the sAMAccountName
username - user to connect to AD as
password - password to connect to AD as

Responses\:
success - created new user in AD
failure - failed to create user

Extra Results\:
userDN - the distinguished name of the newly created user
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.1d16fc4b-beb3-4707-83a8-d93b464579f6.prompt=Enter OU's Distinguished Name(DN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.230cf2ec-8f25-453e-8c13-3314565de149.prompt=Enter computer Distinguished Name(DN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.2d90a520-b169-49f0-b886-00ebe1365b92.prompt=Enter OU's Distinguished Name(DN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.30b472db-ce6e-45dd-a28b-b55906cd92cb.prompt=Enter username\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.39fe4675-54c0-40c1-9eef-b7a164c025ad.prompt=Enter username\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.426fc60c-9975-4a50-8050-9bf7ab3c0132.prompt=Enter password\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.44ab9342-53eb-47af-9ac4-459a372d2251.prompt=Enter host\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.4f2b1089-9372-4735-bffd-88d933104597.prompt=Enter OU's Distinguished Name(DN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.501d9fc3-ce68-40a1-b855-d8c920e1db19.prompt=Enter OU's Distinguished Name(DN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.539cb125-5034-4da5-8b72-053c9077d272.prompt=Enter host\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.57e33ae7-5ef1-4033-9487-14c33f459ec1.prompt=Enter sAMAccountName\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.58a0d651-65e5-47d6-a85f-9c5d5b980c3b.prompt=Enter host\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.5a4ca36f-0f39-4158-b3a4-ec994ea30b42.prompt=Enter password\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.605e682d-07e8-46cf-92d2-45ef4a6f8534.prompt=Enter user Common Name(CN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.61b46ecd-ff69-4f3d-9c61-6fef07a9ee82.prompt=Enter user Common Name(CN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.69e5d0fa-e373-424e-8be9-464377fa56b6.prompt=Enter username\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.76c4b9eb-b5f7-41a2-971d-231597461832.description=
Deletes a user from Active Directory.

Inputs\:
host - the domain controller to connect to
username - the windows username to connect to active directory as
password - password for username.
oUDN - the Organizational Unit DN or Common Name DN the user that should be deleted is in
userCommonName - the CN, generally the full name of user (i.e. Bob Smith)


Responses\:
success - user was successfully deleted
failure - failed to delete user

Extra Results\:
userDN - The distinguinsed name of the user that was deleted.
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.7c5cf041-89b3-46c2-ac1f-78e934c95445.prompt=Enter username\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.7d733d41-8be2-4e82-8e97-752fd3476b1d.prompt=Enter host\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.81116304-a091-40df-840e-e794396c4e41.prompt=Enter password\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.96e9e7b3-3d84-4a8c-81f5-d94ba4a46da0.description=
Checks to see if a user account is enabled in Active Directory.

Inputs\:
host - The domain controller to connect to
oUDN - the Organizational Unit DN or Common Name DN the user is in (i.e. OU\=OUTest1,DC\=battleground,DC\=ad)
userCommonName - The name of the user to check
username - the windows username to connect to active directory as
password - password for username

Responses\:
success - The user is enabled
failure - The user is disabled or something went wrong

Extra Results\:
userDN - The distinguinsed name of the user.
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.9ba2eef2-a70e-4fdf-b31f-3f16c43fe8e4.prompt=Enter password\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.9d68f225-08c9-4729-bc07-6f1982e54276.description=
Resets a users password in Active Directory.

Inputs\:
host - hostname or IP Address of AD Server
userDN - distinguished name of the user whose password you want to change
userPassword - the new password
username - account with admin privlidges or reset password privlidges in domain
password - password to admin account

Responeses\:
success - password has been reset
failure - failed to reset password
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.a5cb2aea-5bc4-434d-87f5-74dd76117e73.description=
Enables a user account in Active Directory.

Inputs\:
host - the domain controller to connect to
oUDN - the Organizational Unit DN or Common Name DN the user is in (i.e. OU\=OUTest1,DC\=battleground,DC\=ad)
userCommonName - the name of the user (its CN)
username - the windows username to connect to active directory as
password - password for username

Responses\:
success - user was successfully enabled
failure - something went wrong

Extra Results\:
userDN - The distinguinsed name of the user that was enabled.
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.ad0f165a-d190-48e0-bf43-6562f13f36d6.prompt=Password\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.b63df038-d844-48db-aaf3-c143e55e1cec.prompt=Enter user Common Name(CN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.c294cea3-b45a-4e88-86c9-a40eea2cbe1e.prompt=Enter username\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.c4b6e673-f756-4c8c-a3d8-9ecc3f1bb643.prompt=Enter host\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.cd829767-09f2-4c74-8eb8-c84a91d41617.prompt=Enter user Common Name(CN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.ce162172-6581-428f-8919-20bb4054e9c5.description=
Disables a user account in Active Directory.

Inputs\:
host - the domain controller to connect to
oUDN - the Organizational Unit DN or Common Name DN the user is in (i.e. OU\=OUTest1,DC\=battleground,DC\=ad)
userCommonName - the name of the user (its CN)
username - the windows username to connect to active directory as
password - password for username

Responses\:
success - user was successfully disabled
failure - something went wrong

Extra Results\:
userDN - The distinguinsed name of the user that was disabled.
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.ddb8261a-146e-4b41-8df2-83d305715d4f.prompt=Host\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.description=
Authenticates the user, creates a new user account in Active Directory, performs some operations on it (disables and enables it, resets it password) and then deletes it.

Input Parameters\:
host - domain controller
rootDN - the distinguished name of the root element whose subtree you want to search in
OU - the Organizational Unit DN or Common Name DN to add the user to (i.e. OU\=OUTest1,DC\=battleground,DC\=ad)
userCommonName - the CN, generally the full name of user (i.e. Bob Smith)
sAMAccountName - the sAMAccountName
userPassword - password for user (must be at least 5 characters long)
username - user to connect to AD as
password - password to connect to AD as

Responses\:
success - all operations finished successfully
failure - failed to do some operation
130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.e1b444d6-a3be-4310-9aac-dbde6bd147b4.prompt=Enter user Common Name(CN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.ecc4b976-81e4-4c93-94d0-c324b66b0d4a.prompt=Username\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.ecf6b80d-78e9-40d5-a09b-eac15611421a.prompt=Enter username\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.ee3950eb-47cd-4563-88dd-e473b277b966.prompt=Enter OU's Distinguished Name(DN)\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.eee8e655-739e-4128-9733-343c91628577.prompt=Enter password\: 130ee383-01a6-4895-bb47-5e3a71e085c3.fa6cdfce-3baf-44ce-93dc-dd919df87d4a.prompt=Enter host\:
flow.name: Test Users Sample
